DetailTable.SelectQuery: SELECT OrderID, OrderDate, ClientID, StaffID, VendorID FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE ClientID = @ClientID
DetailTable.InsertQuery: INSERT INTO PurchaseOrders(OrderDate, ClientID, StaffID, VendorID) VALUES(@OrderDate, @ClientID, @StaffID, @VendorID)
DetailTable.UpdateQuery: UPDATE PurchaseOrders SET OrderDate = @OrderDate, StaffID = @StaffID, VendorID = @VendorID WHERE OrderID = @OrderID
